p: About 500 µl serum of each patient was collected and used to extract the viral RNA. HIV and HCV RNA were extracted by using the TIANamp virus RNA Kit (TIANGEN, China) according to the manual. The NS5B gene of HCV was amplified by using the primers and polymerase chain reaction conditions in our previous study [ 5]. Then, the products were sequenced by using the Sanger sequencing method.
